---
keywords:
  - algolia
  - search
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Search

translations.zh-hant: # 搜尋功能

segments.source_content: There are a few options you can use to add search to your website:

translations.zh-hant: 您可以透過以下幾種方式為網站添加搜尋功能：

segments.source_content:
- 🥇 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch) (**official**)
- 👥 [Typesense DocSearch](#using-typesense-docsearch)
- 👥 [Local Search](#using-local-search)
- 👥 [Your own `SearchBar` component](#using-your-own-search)

translations.zh-hant:
- 🥇 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch)（**官方支援**）
- 👥 [Typesense DocSearch](#using-typesense-docsearch)
- 👥 [本地搜尋](#using-local-search)
- 👥 [自訂 `SearchBar` 組件](#using-your-own-search)

segments.source_content:
:::info

🥇 Docusaurus provides **first-class support** for [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch).

👥 Other options are **maintained by the community**: please report bugs to their respective repositories.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

🥇 Docusaurus 對 [Algolia DocSearch](#using-algolia-docsearch) 提供**一級支援**。

👥 其他選項由**社群維護**：請將問題回報至各自的程式庫。

:::

segments.source_content: ## 🥇 Using Algolia DocSearch {#using-algolia-docsearch}

translations.zh-hant: ## 🥇 使用 Algolia DocSearch {#using-algolia-docsearch}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has **official support** for [Algolia DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus **官方支援** [Algolia DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com)。

segments.source_content: The service is **free** for any open-source project: just make sure to read the [checklist](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply/) and [apply to the DocSearch program](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply).

translations.zh-hant: 該服務對所有開源專案**免費**：請務必閱讀[檢查清單](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply/)並[申請 DocSearch 計畫](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply)。

segments.source_content: DocSearch crawls your website once a week (the schedule is configurable from the web interface) and aggregates all the content in an Algolia index. This content is then queried directly from your front-end using the Algolia API.

translations.zh-hant: DocSearch 每週會爬取您的網站一次（排程可透過網頁介面設定），並將所有內容彙總至 Algolia 索引中。這些內容隨後會透過 Algolia API 直接從前端查詢。

segments.source_content: If your website is [not eligible](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply) for the free, hosted version of DocSearch, or if your website sits behind a firewall and is not public, then you can [run your own](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/run-your-own/) DocSearch crawler.

translations.zh-hant: 若您的網站[不符合](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/who-can-apply)免費託管版 DocSearch 的資格，或網站位於防火牆後且非公開狀態，您可以[自行運行](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/run-your-own/) DocSearch 爬蟲。

segments.source_content:
:::note

By default, the Docusaurus preset generates a [sitemap.xml](https://docusaurus.io/sitemap.xml) that the Algolia crawler can use.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

預設情況下，Docusaurus 預設配置會生成 Algolia 爬蟲可使用的 [sitemap.xml](https://docusaurus.io/sitemap.xml)。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info[From the old docsearch?]

You can read more about migration from the legacy DocSearch infra in [our blog post](/blog/2021/11/21/algolia-docsearch-migration) or [the DocSearch migration docs](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info[來自舊版 docsearch？]

您可以在[我們的部落格文章](/blog/2021/11/21/algolia-docsearch-migration)或 [DocSearch 遷移文件](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/migrating-from-legacy)中閱讀更多關於從舊版 DocSearch 基礎架構遷移的資訊。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Index Configuration {#algolia-index-configuration}

translations.zh-hant: ### 索引配置 {#algolia-index-configuration}

segments.source_content: After your application has been approved and deployed, you will receive an email with all the details for you to add DocSearch to your project. Editing and managing your crawls can be done via [the web interface](https://crawler.algolia.com/). Indices are readily available after deployment, so manual configuration usually isn't necessary.

translations.zh-hant: 申請通過並部署後，您將收到一封包含所有詳細資訊的電子郵件，以便將 DocSearch 添加到專案中。可透過[網頁介面](https://crawler.algolia.com/)編輯和管理爬取作業。索引在部署後立即可用，因此通常無需手動配置。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

It is highly recommended to use a config similar to the [**Docusaurus 2 website config**](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/templates/#docusaurus-v2-template).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

強烈建議使用類似於 [**Docusaurus 2 網站配置**](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/templates/#docusaurus-v2-template)的設定。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Connecting Algolia {#connecting-algolia}

translations.zh-hant: ### 連接 Algolia {#connecting-algolia}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus' own `@docusaurus/preset-classic` supports Algolia DocSearch integration. If you use the classic preset, no additional installation is needed.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 自帶的 `@docusaurus/preset-classic` 支援 Algolia DocSearch 整合。若使用經典預設配置，則無需額外安裝。

segments.source_content: Installation steps when not using @docusaurus/preset-classic 1. Install the package: ```bash npm2yarn npm install --save @docusaurus/theme-search-algolia ``` 2. Register the theme in `docusaurus.config.js`: ```js title="docusaurus.config.js" module.exports = { title: 'My site', // ... themes: ['@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia'], themeConfig: { // ... }, }; ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_60e88cae

segments.source_content: Then, add an `algolia` field in your `themeConfig`. **[Apply for DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply/)** to get your Algolia index and API key.

translations.zh-hant: 接著，在 `themeConfig` 中添加 `algolia` 欄位。**[申請 DocSearch](https://docsearch.algolia.com/apply/)** 以取得 Algolia 索引和 API 金鑰。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_8c3563d3

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `searchParameters` option used to be named `algoliaOptions` in Docusaurus v1.

Refer to its [official DocSearch documentation](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api#searchparameters) for possible values.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

`searchParameters` 選項在 Docusaurus v1 中名為 `algoliaOptions`。

請參閱其[官方 DocSearch 文件](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api#searchparameters)了解可能的數值。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

The search feature will not work reliably until Algolia crawls your site.

If search doesn't work after any significant change, please use the Algolia dashboard to **trigger a new crawl**.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

在 Algolia 爬取您的網站之前，搜尋功能可能無法可靠運作。

若重大變更後搜尋仍無法運作，請使用 Algolia 儀表板**觸發新的爬取作業**。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Contextual search {#contextual-search}

translations.zh-hant: ### 上下文搜尋 {#contextual-search}

segments.source_content: Contextual search is **enabled by default**.

translations.zh-hant: 上下文搜尋功能**預設為啟用**。

segments.source_content: It ensures that search results are **relevant to the current language and version**.

translations.zh-hant: 它能確保搜尋結果**與當前語言和版本相關**。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_7d56fc4b

segments.source_content: Let's consider you have 2 docs versions (**v1** and **v2**) and 2 languages (`en` and `fr`).

translations.zh-hant: 假設您有2個文件版本（**v1**和**v2**）以及2種語言（`en`和`fr`）。

segments.source_content: When browsing v2 docs, it would be odd to return search results for the v1 documentation. Sometimes v1 and v2 docs are quite similar, and you would end up with duplicate search results for the same query (one result per version).

translations.zh-hant: 當瀏覽v2文件時，若搜尋結果顯示v1文件會顯得奇怪。有時v1和v2文件內容相似，可能導致同一查詢出現重複結果（每個版本各顯示一次）。

segments.source_content: Similarly, when browsing the French site, it would be odd to return search results for the English docs.

translations.zh-hant: 同理，瀏覽法文網站時，若顯示英文文件的搜尋結果也不合理。

segments.source_content: To solve this problem, the contextual search feature understands that you are browsing a specific docs version and language, and will create the search query filters dynamically.

translations.zh-hant: 為解決此問題，上下文搜尋功能會識別您當前瀏覽的文件版本與語言，並動態建立搜尋過濾條件。

segments.source_content:
- on `/en/docs/v1/myDoc`, search results will only include **English** results for the **v1** docs (+ other unversioned pages)
- on `/fr/docs/v2/myDoc`, search results will only include **French** results for the **v2** docs (+ other unversioned pages)

translations.zh-hant:
- 在`/en/docs/v1/myDoc`頁面時，搜尋結果僅包含**v1**版本的**英文**內容（及其他未版本化的頁面）
- 在`/fr/docs/v2/myDoc`頁面時，搜尋結果僅包含**v2**版本的**法文**內容（及其他未版本化的頁面）

segments.source_content: ### Styling your Algolia search {#styling-your-algolia-search}

translations.zh-hant: ### 自訂Algolia搜尋樣式 {#styling-your-algolia-search}

segments.source_content: By default, DocSearch comes with a fine-tuned theme that was designed for accessibility, making sure that colors and contrasts respect standards.

translations.zh-hant: DocSearch預設採用經過微調的主題，設計符合無障礙標準，確保色彩與對比度達標。

segments.source_content: Still, you can reuse the [Infima CSS variables](styling-layout.mdx#styling-your-site-with-infima) from Docusaurus to style DocSearch by editing the `/src/css/custom.css` file.

translations.zh-hant: 您仍可透過編輯`/src/css/custom.css`檔案，使用Docusaurus的[Infima CSS變數](styling-layout.mdx#styling-your-site-with-infima)來調整DocSearch樣式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5b2e44c7

segments.source_content: ### Customizing the Algolia search behavior {#customizing-the-algolia-search-behavior}

translations.zh-hant: ### 自訂Algolia搜尋行為 {#customizing-the-algolia-search-behavior}

segments.source_content: Algolia DocSearch supports a [list of options](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api/) that you can pass to the `algolia` field in the `docusaurus.config.js` file.

translations.zh-hant: Algolia DocSearch支援[多項參數設定](https://docsearch.algolia.com/docs/api/)，可透過`docusaurus.config.js`檔案中的`algolia`欄位傳遞。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f4341a93

segments.source_content: ### Editing the Algolia search component {#editing-the-algolia-search-component}

translations.zh-hant: ### 修改Algolia搜尋元件 {#editing-the-algolia-search-component}

segments.source_content: If you prefer to edit the Algolia search React component, [swizzle](swizzling.mdx) the `SearchBar` component in `@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia`:

translations.zh-hant: 若要直接編輯Algolia搜尋的React元件，請對`@docusaurus/theme-search-algolia`中的`SearchBar`元件進行[swizzle](swizzling.mdx)操作：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-search-algolia SearchBar
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d76894b4

segments.source_content: ### Support {#algolia-support}

translations.zh-hant: ### 技術支援 {#algolia-support}

segments.source_content: The Algolia DocSearch team can help you figure out search problems on your site.

translations.zh-hant: Algolia DocSearch團隊可協助解決網站搜尋問題。

segments.source_content: You can contact them by [email](mailto:documentationsearch@algolia.com) or on [Discord](https://discord.gg/tXdr5mP).

translations.zh-hant: 可透過[電子郵件](mailto:documentationsearch@algolia.com)或[Discord](https://discord.gg/tXdr5mP)聯繫他們。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus also has an `#algolia` channel on [Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus在[Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/docusaurus)上也設有`#algolia`頻道。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using Typesense DocSearch {#using-typesense-docsearch}

translations.zh-hant: ## 👥 使用Typesense DocSearch {#using-typesense-docsearch}

segments.source_content: [Typesense](https://typesense.org) DocSearch works similar to Algolia DocSearch, except that your website is indexed into a Typesense search cluster.

translations.zh-hant: [Typesense](https://typesense.org) DocSearch運作方式類似Algolia DocSearch，差別在於網站內容會被索引至Typesense搜尋叢集。

segments.source_content: Typesense is an [open source](https://github.com/typesense/typesense) instant-search engine that you can either:

translations.zh-hant: Typesense 是一個[開源](https://github.com/typesense/typesense)的即時搜尋引擎，您可以選擇：

segments.source_content:
- [Self-Host](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/install-typesense.html#option-2-local-machine-self-hosting) on your own servers or
- Use the Managed [Typesense Cloud](https://cloud.typesense.org) service.

translations.zh-hant:
- 在自有伺服器上[自行託管](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/install-typesense.html#option-2-local-machine-self-hosting)，或
- 使用託管服務 [Typesense Cloud](https://cloud.typesense.org)。

segments.source_content: Similar to Algolia DocSearch, there are two components:

translations.zh-hant: 與 Algolia DocSearch 類似，包含兩個元件：

segments.source_content:
- [typesense-docsearch-scraper](https://github.com/typesense/typesense-docsearch-scraper) - which scrapes your website and indexes the data in your Typesense cluster.
- [docusaurus-theme-search-typesense](https://github.com/typesense/docusaurus-theme-search-typesense) - a search bar UI component to add to your website.

translations.zh-hant:
- [typesense-docsearch-scraper](https://github.com/typesense/typesense-docsearch-scraper) - 用於爬取網站內容並將資料索引至您的 Typesense 叢集。
- [docusaurus-theme-search-typesense](https://github.com/typesense/docusaurus-theme-search-typesense) - 可整合至網站的搜尋列 UI 元件。

segments.source_content: Read a step-by-step walk-through of how to [run typesense-docsearch-scraper here](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/docsearch.html#step-1-set-up-docsearch-scraper) and how to [install the Search Bar in your Docusaurus Site here](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/docsearch.html#option-a-docusaurus-powered-sites).

translations.zh-hant: 請參閱逐步教學：[如何執行 typesense-docsearch-scraper](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/docsearch.html#step-1-set-up-docsearch-scraper) 以及[如何在 Docusaurus 網站安裝搜尋列](https://typesense.org/docs/latest/guide/docsearch.html#option-a-docusaurus-powered-sites)。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using Local Search {#using-local-search}

translations.zh-hant: ## 👥 使用本地搜尋 {#using-local-search}

segments.source_content: You can use a local search plugin for websites where the search index is small and can be downloaded to your users' browsers when they visit your website.

translations.zh-hant: 若網站搜尋索引規模較小，可考慮使用本地搜尋外掛，將索引檔案下載至使用者瀏覽器端執行搜尋。

segments.source_content: You'll find a list of community-supported [local search plugins listed here](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#search).

translations.zh-hant: 社群支援的[本地搜尋外掛清單可在此查閱](https://docusaurus.io/community/resources#search)。

segments.source_content: ## 👥 Using your own search {#using-your-own-search}

translations.zh-hant: ## 👥 使用自訂搜尋 {#using-your-own-search}

segments.source_content: To use your own search, swizzle the `SearchBar` component in `@docusaurus/theme-classic`

translations.zh-hant: 若要使用自訂搜尋功能，請替換 `@docusaurus/theme-classic` 中的 `SearchBar` 元件

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run swizzle @docusaurus/theme-classic SearchBar
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d96a088c

segments.source_content: This will create an `src/themes/SearchBar` file in your project folder. Restart your dev server and edit the component, you will see that Docusaurus uses your own `SearchBar` component now.

translations.zh-hant: 此操作會在專案中建立 `src/themes/SearchBar` 檔案。重新啟動開發伺服器並編輯該元件後，Docusaurus 將改用您的自訂 `SearchBar` 元件。

segments.source_content: **Notes**: You can alternatively [swizzle from Algolia SearchBar](#editing-the-algolia-search-component) and create your own search component from there.

translations.zh-hant: **注意**：您也可以[從 Algolia SearchBar 進行替換](#editing-the-algolia-search-component)，並以此為基礎建立自訂搜尋元件。
